snippet: The Iranian government said it would hold the United States responsible for the fate of a group of Iranians held by Syrian rebels following an artillery attack that reportedly killed three of them.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian government said it would hold the United States responsible for the fate of a group of Iranians held by Syrian rebels following an artillery attack that reportedly killed three of them.

headline.seo: Iran Warns United States on Fate of Hostages in Syria
